韠字的基本解释

韠
bì
蔽膝，古代一种遮蔽在身前的皮制服饰：“庶见素韠兮。”

韠字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bì］
［《廣韻》卑吉切，入質，幫。］
皮制的蔽膝。古代朝觐或祭祀用以遮蔽在衣裳前。

韠字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【韋字部】　韠； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1395第10
【唐韻】?吉切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】璧吉切，?音必。【說文】韍也。所以蔽前。以韋。下廣二尺，上廣一尺，其頸五寸。一命縕韠，再命赤韠。从韋畢聲。【廣韻】胡服蔽膝。【詩·檜風】庶見素韠兮。又【小雅·采菽箋】芾，太古蔽膝之象也。冕服謂之芾，其他服謂之韠。【疏】韍、韠俱是蔽膝之象，其制同。【禮·玉藻】韠，君朱，大夫素，士爵韋。【註】此?端服之韠也。韠之言蔽也。凡韠以韋爲之，必象裳色。【廣韻】或作㻫。俗作鞸。【集韻】通作縪。

韠字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
韠字的起名意思

暂无。

韠
Basic explanation of words
韠
bì
Covering the knees, an ancient leather garment that hides in front of the body: "You see Su Yunxi."
韠
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bì］
["Guangyun" Beiji cuts, enters the quality, helps. ]
Leather knees. Ancient pilgrimages or sacrifices were used to hide in front of clothes.
韠
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Su Ji] [Wei Zi Department] 　韠; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 1395 No. 10
[Tang Yun]? Jiqie [Jiyun] [Rhyme] [Zhengyun] Bi Jiqie, the sound must be. [Said Wen] Yun Ye. So cover the front. Yi Wei. The lower width is two feet, and the upper width is one foot, and its neck is five inches. One fate a 縕韠, and then a red 韠. Sound from Weibi. [Guang Yun] Hu Fu covers the knees. 【Poetry·Juniper Wind】Generally see Su Yunxi. Also 【Xiaoya·Caishu Paper】Fu, the image of the ancients that hides the knees. Mian clothing is called Fu, and other clothing is called Yun. [Sparse] Yun and Yun are the elephants that cover the knees, and their systems are the same. [Rite·Yuzao] Yun, Jun Zhu, Doctor Su, Shijuewei. [Note] This? The Yun of end service. Yunzhi's words are also covered. Fan Yun takes Wei as it, and he will look like a dress. [Guang Yun] Or as 㻫. Vulgarly made. 【Ji Yun】Through all works.
